document_data.name: Rengardt
document_data.speakers: [[Rengarth]]<ref group="note" name="speakers">Due to its positioning in the language tree and its name, it is likely but not explicitly stated that this was the language of the [[Rengarth]] and [[Angardt]] people, relations of the [[Netherese]].
document_data.mainbody: '''Rengardt''' was a dead language (as of the 1300s [[DR]]) and a member of the [[Low Ulutim languages]] subgroup.<ref name=D:SiT-p28>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}} It was presumably spoken by the [[Rengarth]] tribes.<ref group="note" name="speakers" />
